thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian REIT And Choice Properties REIT Obtain Court Approval And Set Election Deadline And Closing Date For Acquisition

title: BRIEF-Canadian REIT And Choice Properties REIT Obtain Court Approval And Set Election Deadline And Closing Date For Acquisition

organizations.name: min read    choice properties real estate investment trust

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Choice Properties Real Estate Investment Trust:
* CANADIAN REIT AND CHOICE PROPERTIES REIT OBTAIN COURT APPROVAL AND SET ELECTION DEADLINE AND CLOSING DATE FOR ACQUISITION
* CHOICE PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST - CREIT AND CHOICE PROPERTIES ALSO ANNOUNCED THAT ARRANGEMENT IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE ON MAY 4, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
